price: Uns beeilen, ihnen gute Dinge (zu gewähren)? Aber nein! Sie merken nicht.
arabic: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِۚ بَل لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: nusāriʿu lahum fī al-khayrāti bal lā yashʿurūna
